category.description: When should cows be wintered off farm

module.description: Module used to manage wintering off

script.name: start_of_day
script.text: if ((today >= date('[DCWO]')) and (today <= date('[DSWO]'))) then '[module]' set PWO = [PropWO] else '[module]' set PWO = 0.0 endif

category.description: When should cows be on a stand-off

script.name: start_of_day
script.text: if ((today >= date('[DCSO]')) and (today <= date('[DSSO]'))) then '[module]' set PSO = [prop], else '[module]' set PSO = 0.0 endif

module.description: Module used to manage wintering off

script.name: init
script.text: if ('[enable]' = 'yes') then '[module]' set WinterOffDryStock = 1 else '[module]' set WinterOffDryStock = 0 endif

trigger_mass.description: Close paddock if pasture mass exceeds (kg/ha) :

silage_store.description: Store conserved feed for later use

silage_on_hand.description: Feed stored on farm at start of simulation (kgDM/ha)

script.name: init
script.text: ConservationStart = '[start_date]' ConservationFinish = '[finish_date]' ConservationTrigger = [trigger_mass] ConservationResidual = [residual] if '[silage_store]' = 'yes' then SilageStoreEnable = 1 SilageStore = [silage_on_hand] SilageME = [energy_content] else SilageStoreEnable = 0 SilageStore = 0 endif

DDRules.PeakStockingRate = [stocking_rate] DDRules.FarmArea = [farm_area] DDRules.PorportionOfFarmInLaneWays = 0.01 DDRules.HoursOnLaneWays = 1 DDRules.HoursInDairyShed = 4 DDRules.EffluentPaddocksPercentage = 0.18 DDRules.SupplementME = 12.5 DDRules.SupplementN = 0.035 DDRules.SupplementWastage = 0 DDRules.SupplementDigestability = 0.7 DDRules.MilkCurve = '[milk_prod]' DDRules.LWtCurve = '[Live_Wt]' DDRules.AllocationType = 1 DDRules.SilageME = 10.0
if ('[DoWinter]' = 'yes') then DDRules.WinterOffDryStock = 1 else DDRules.WinterOffDryStock = 0 endif

trigger.description: Enter sw deficit to irrigate at (mm)

script.text: if PlantAvalibleWater < [trigger] then DDRules ApplyIrrigation amount = [mmAmount] endif

operation.action: DDRules ApplyFertiliser amount = 12.5 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
DDRules ApplyFertiliser amount = 12.5 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()

script.text: if (today = date('[date]')) then DDRules.GrazingResidual = [residual] DDRules.GrazingInterval = [length] endif

soil.name: EyreLike
soil.DataSource: Generic profile descriptions provided by Trevor Webb and data for functional horizions based on SWAMP project results
soil.Comments: Trevor Webb says Eyre soils are not at the extreme end of the possibilities for this soil name. Based on Eyre stony (less stones). Bulk density values were measured on the fine earth fraction so values entered into apsim soil are adjusted down to account for stone content (assuming stones are inert from all soil process so their mass and volume is removed from model paramaters). SAT, DUL, LL15 and Air dry have been adjusted down to account for stone content. OC has not been adjusted so the model will get the correct carbon and N amounts using the adjusted BD.

soil.name: PaparuaLike
soil.DataSource: Generic profile descriptions provided by Trevor Webb and data for functional horizions based on SWAMP project results
soil.Comments: VERY ROUGH based on discussion with Trevor Webb - taken from the "Canterbury Light" generic soil but no stones untiol 0.7 m - assume soil properties from 30 cm apply down to 70 cm.Bulk density values were measured on the fine earth fraction so values entered into apsim soil are adjusted down to account for stone content (assuming stones are inert from all soil process so their mass and volume is removed from model paramaters). SAT, DUL, LL15 and Air dry have been adjusted down to account for stone content. OC has not been adjusted so the model will get the correct carbon and N amounts using the adjusted BD.

soil.name: TempletonLike
soil.DataSource: Generic profile descriptions provided by Trevor Webb and data for functional horizions based on SWAMP project results
soil.Comments: Bulk density values were measured on the fine earth fraction so values entered into apsim soil are adjusted down to account for stone content (assuming stones are inert from all soil process so their mass and volume is removed from model paramaters). SAT, DUL, LL15 and Air dry have been adjusted down to account for stone content. OC has not been adjusted so the model will get the correct carbon and N amounts using the adjusted BD.

soil.name: TemukaLike
soil.DataSource: Generic profile descriptions provided by Trevor Webb and data for functional horizions based on SWAMP project results
soil.Comments: Bulk density values were measured on the fine earth fraction so values entered into apsim soil are adjusted down to account for stone content (assuming stones are inert from all soil process so their mass and volume is removed from model paramaters). SAT, DUL, LL15 and Air dry have been adjusted down to account for stone content. OC has not been adjusted so the model will get the correct carbon and N amounts using the adjusted BD.

manager2.name: Centre Piviot
manager2.text:
Imports System Imports ModelFramework
Public Class Script Inherits Instance
Dim myIrrigation_efficiency As Double <Link()> Dim MyPaddock As Paddock
<EventHandler()> Public Sub OnInit2() myIrrigation_efficiency = 1.0 End Sub
<Output()> Public Property irrigation_efficiency() As Double Get Return myIrrigation_efficiency End Get Set(ByVal value As Double) If (value < 0) Then myIrrigation_efficiency = 0 ElseIf (value > 1) Then myIrrigation_efficiency = 1 Else myIrrigation_efficiency = value End If End Set End Property
<EventHandler()> Public Sub OnApply(amount As IrrigationApplicationType) For Each SubPaddock As Paddock In MyPaddock.SubPaddocks Dim myIrrigation As Irrigation = SubPaddock.ComponentByType("Irrigation") ' myIrrigation.irrigation_efficiency = myIrrigation_efficiency myIrrigation.Apply(amount) Next End Sub End Class

pastdays.description: If rainfall over the past number of days

irrigate_module.description: Module used to apply the irrigation :

script.text:
!if not enough rain has occured then irrigate. !Irrigate with the amount that is missing. !Only irrigate if a certain number of days have passed.
if (rain[[pastdays]] < [EnoughRain]) then '[irrigate_module]' set irrigation_efficiency = [irrigate_efficiency] difference = [EnoughRain] - rain[[pastdays]] '[irrigate_module]' apply amount = 5.5 (mm) endif
if (today = date('[date]')) then DDRules.GrazingResidual = [residual] DDRules.GrazingInterval = [length] endif

manager2.name: Farm_Fert
manager2.text:
Imports System Imports ModelFramework
Public Class Script Inherits Instance
<Link()> Dim MyPaddock As Paddock
<EventHandler()> Public Sub OnApply(fert As FertiliserApplicationType) For Each SubPaddock As Paddock In MyPaddock.SubPaddocks Dim myFertiliser As Fertiliser = SubPaddock.ComponentByType("Fertiliser") myFertiliser.Apply(fert) Next End Sub End Class

operation.action: Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()
Farm_Fert apply amount = 50 (kg/ha), depth = 0 (mm), type = urea_N()

event.name: Daily
event.description: End of daily simulation time step

script.text:
TotalNIn = N_Eaten_Pasture + N_Eaten_Supplement NIntakeBalance = TotalNIn - N_Eaten
TotalNOut = N_to_BC + N_to_feaces + N_to_milk + N_to_urine NOutBalance = TotalNOut - N_Out
NTotalBalance = NIntakeBalance - NOutBalance

manager.name: Stop storing silage on a fixed date
